title: Xiaohongshu Data Retrieval

alerts.selectNumberField: Based on Xiaohongshu article link, retrieve data like title, like count, etc.
alerts.selectGroupFieldTip: The plugin can automatically create selected fields. If mapping is needed, please ensure the field names in the multidimensional table match the option names. It's recommended that the 'Blogger' field type is text, 'xx Count' field types are numbers, 'xx Time' fields are dates. 'Total Interaction Count' field can be calculated from multiple fields

checks.datetime: Type validation failed: Type is not a date
checks.attachment: Type validation failed: Type is not an attachment

placeholder.link: Please select the field column corresponding to the video link
